postpaid plans generally offer better rates and a wider range of additional services and options. If you've decided to go with a postpaid plan, you have two options Contract (engagement) Contract-Free (sans engagement)
To know more about the pffering, please visit Post-paid offer.

All prepaid recharge credit include some amounts of calling time and text messages, and some include a small amount of data. Some providers even offer unlimited calling time 24/7

To know more about the offering, please visit pre-paid offer.
